sentence.text: Angiosarcomas in aP2-Cre;Dicer1Flox/- epidermis development histologically and genetically resemble human angiosarcoma.

Here, we show that biallelic production of siRNA involved in RNA interference deletion with aP2-Cre drives aggressive and metastatic angiosarcoma independent of other genetically engineered oncogenes or tumor suppressor loss.

entity.text: production of siRNA involved in RNA interference

sentence.text: These studies illustrate that production of siRNA involved in RNA interference can function as a traditional loss-of-function tumor suppressor gene, and they provide a fully penetrant animal model for the study of angiosarcoma development and metastasis.

entity.text: production of siRNA involved in RNA interference
